title: Deep Research Actor
description: AI-powered deep research using Gemini with Google Search grounding. Extracts verified findings with bias detection, multi-perspective expert analysis, and interactive HTML reports.

query.title: Research Query
query.description: The research question or topic to investigate. Be specific for best results. Example: 'AI coding assistants market 2025 GitHub Copilot vs Cursor enterprise adoption'
query.prefill: What is the current adoption rate of AI coding assistants among professional developers in 2025?

template.title: Research Template
template.description: Choose the type of research to perform. Each template has specialized finding types and expert perspectives.
enumTitles: Competitive - Market sizing, competitor profiling, SWOT analysis
Contract - Government contracts, pricing analysis, fraud detection
Due Diligence - Company/vendor vetting, red flags, risk assessment
Financial - Stock analysis, earnings, valuations, SEC filings
Investigative - Background checks, relationship mapping, hidden connections
Legal - Case law, regulations, compliance, enforcement actions
Purchase Decision - Product research, real reviews, value analysis
Reputation - Is it legit? Scam checks, trust verification, complaint patterns
Tech Market - Developer tools, AI/ML trends, market predictions
Understanding - Major events, media credibility, misinformation detection

granularity.title: Research Depth
granularity.description: How thorough should the research be? Affects search count, findings, and cost.
enumTitles: Quick - Fast overview, 3-5 searches, 8-15 findings (~1-2 min, ~$0.06)
Standard - Balanced depth, 5-8 searches, 15-25 findings (~2-4 min, ~$0.12)

generate_report.title: Generate Report
generate_report.description: Generate a formatted research report. Report type is auto-selected based on template for best results.

report_format.title: Report Format
report_format.description: Output format for the report. HTML includes interactive visualizations.
enumTitles: HTML - Rich interactive dashboard with visualizations (Recommended)
DOCX - Microsoft Word structure for stakeholders

input_file_url.title: Context Document (Optional)
input_file_url.description: URL to a PDF or text file to include as additional context. Useful for analyzing specific documents alongside web research.

input_text.title: Additional Context (Optional)
input_text.description: Extra text context to guide the research. Include specific questions, background info, or constraints.

send_email.title: Send Report via Email
send_email.description: Send the research report to an email address when complete. Note: Some regional email providers may filter emails - use Gmail/Outlook for best deliverability.

email_to.title: Recipient Email
email_to.description: Email address to send the report to. For best deliverability, use Gmail, Outlook, or Yahoo addresses.

email_subject.title: Email Subject (Optional)
email_subject.description: Custom email subject line. If not provided, uses 'Research Complete: [query]'

progress_webhook_url.title: Progress Webhook URL (Optional)
progress_webhook_url.description: URL to receive real-time research progress events via HTTP POST. Events include: search_started, search_completed, perspectives_completed, completed, failed.
